tuning_runs.notes: OVER BUDGET by 9.2 min. Score -0.0087 vs baseline. ICA adds ~10+ sec/sample overhead.

hypothesis: ICA achieved best accuracy (1.0422) at 87 min. Using ICA only for initialization (~5-10s) should provide better starting positions for CMA-ES while staying within budget.
key_finding: ICA initialization adds significant overhead (~10 min for 80 samples) without improving accuracy. The ICA-derived source positions are NOT better starting points than random initialization. Baseline CMA-ES is sufficient.
